name: Sub Timestamp
info:
create Timestamp out of Systime

Input

Triggered by any Message

---
Output

 * Input message is passed unchanged.

 * new Objects add:  
    * msg.timestamp.ts = YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM.SS
    * msg.timestamp.YYYY
    * msg.timestamp.MM
    * msg.timestamp.DD
    * msg.timestamp.hh
    * msg.timestamp.mm
    * msg.timestamp.ss


---
